name: Markdown Notes
description:
April 9 2022 Update:

  • added search input and made widget stick to objects


Use Markdown syntax to take detailed and styled notes without having to leave your FigJam board. Since this is a widget any note you add is visible to anyone who has access to that file. But only the person who added that note entry can delete or edit it.


Hit me up on Twitter, If you have bug reports, feature requests or you just want to know the person behind the widget.


Privacy

All your notes are stored inside the FigJam board, they don't leave your file and don't go through any server. But this also means if you delete the file or the widget your notes will also be deleted.
